meta.critical_rules: NO lighting equipment visible, NO light stands, NO softboxes, NO reflectors, NO studio props, NO background paper edges, NO floor visible. Only the dog and solid background color exist in the frame.

positioning.body_visible: face dominant, body receding into background

subject.expression: curious, goofy, sniffing the camera, adorable puppy eyes
subject.focus: nose is sharp and enlarged, ears might be slightly soft focus

lighting.key_light: large softbox centered above camera, NOT visible in frame
lighting.fill_light: ample fill to illuminate the nose texture

background.details: infinite solid color, no visible edges, no floor line, completely blurred due to depth of field, uniform from edge to edge of frame

exclusions: NO softboxes or light stands visible
NO background paper edges or seams
NO props or objects of any kind
NO human hands or body parts
NO shadows from equipment on background
